00123   class FullNameComparer
00124   {
00125   private:
00126       string x;
00127   public:
00128       FullNameComparer(const string & s){ x = s; }
00129       ~FullNameComparer() {};
00130       string X() { return x; }
00131       bool operator ()(parent_component_proxy *arg) { return arg->name() == X(); }
00132   };
00133   virtual bool is_true_component() { return false; }
00134 };
